UiKit

Robust (yet sleek) Javascript/CSS Framework

The Uikit package is a collection of css and javascript that is reliable and comes with good documentation.

How it works
GitHub Pages

Works perfectly on Github Pages.

Made from the bottom up for quick install on GitHub Pages.

View Installation Docs
Installation

Get up and running in less than 10 minutes.

Install miniml's source and JavaScript files via clone, fork, or npm. As simple or as complex as you like.

Download

Quick Install

The easiest way to install quickly is to clone the GitHub repository.

git clone https://github.com/st4rlab/miniml.git

Make sure you have jekyll installed and you can run a build and live test with this:

bundle install
bundle exec jekyll serve

Or install it yourself as:

$ gem install miniml
SVG Icons

Versatile Customizable SVG Icons

Icon set is completely customizable, include your logo or add material design icons. You're in control.
